description:
PrAna has taken a classic look and given it a fresh, Earthy-friendly upgrade with the prAna Baseball Raglan T-Shirt for men. And they recommend grabbing a few colors, because once you try this comfortable staple for yourself, you'll want to start wearing it weekly.

Part of their Fair Trade Certified™ prAna Basics collection, they use an organic cotton and recycled poly blend to create a fabric that’s lightweight, supersoft, and breathable. Perfect for wearing on its own or layering up during colder months.

The cherry on top? This style was made in a Fair Trade Certified™ Factory, which means that financial premiums were sent back to the people who made them.
name: Prana prAna Baseball Raglan - Mens
